HomeAbout

You can't make a decision this big so fast. You decide that you should not accept it. And, going to a school like that isn't exactly what you want to do right now either.

Later, that afternoon, you're forced to go to the market to grab some food. You don't really feel like going, but you don't have much choice. On your way to one of the market stalls, you pass by an open alley.

In an instant a bag is thrown over your head and you're knocked to the ground. Next thing you know, you wake up bumping blindly in a moving vehicle. You've been kidnapped.
